mutants.code:
def reverse_string(s):
    length = len(s)
    start = 1
    end = length - 1
    while start < end:
        s = list(s)
        (s[start], s[end]) = (s[end], s[start])
        s = ''.join(s)
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return s
